# Pull Request Template

## Description

PR guidelines (to be updated as we define project scope).

## Checklist

- [ ] Code format guidelines are followed
- [ ] Added necessary tests for change if needed
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] Docs have been updated if needed

## Performance Regressions

| Benchmark            | Before | After |
|----------------------|--------|-------|
| Load Time (ms)       |        |       |
| Memory Usage (MB)    |        |       |
| Requests/sec         |        |       |
| Database Query Time  |        |       |
